content.d: Did we arrive late!? Let’s hurry up, both of you!
Now, now Honoka, hold on a bit.
That’s right, Honoka-chan. The decorations start here, so let’s take our time and enjoy the view.
That’s true, but... I wanna go now~!
Ah, look over there! Our pop-up! There are posters too!
There’s one over here, too~! This is awesome!
Wow! Let’s take pictures of everything~!
